name: Maiden of the Sea
description:
Short linear story where you reminisce with your wife and try to make amends.

Playtime: ~5-10 mins
~ 1000 words

Created in 1 week for the O2A2 Game Jam!

This is my first ever attempt at a Game Jam project, it was super stressful but a good experience! 
I'm prone to making projects really long or overly complicated, so it was a pretty big challenge for me. It's also been a very long time since I picked up Ren'Py.

I hope you all enjoy!

You can find my social media links on my website; https://kelkilou.wixsite.com/home
